title: IITM Pune Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Research Fellow.Post
description: The Indian Institute of Tropical Meteorology (IITM) Pune has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for the Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., M.Tech., and Post Graduation can apply for the IITM Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
